text: Yahukanye n’uwo mukenyezi ubugira gatatu, rero uyo mugabo ntarekuriwe n’amategeko kuriwe munyuma yaho kugeza aho azo kwubaka urwiwe k’uwundi mugabo mushasha, nuyo nawe ni yahukana nawe aho ntagicumuro kuribo cuko bosubirana babonye yuko bazohagarika imbibe z’Imana. Izi nizo mbibe z’Imana zimenyesha abantu bafise ubumenyi buhagije
